casebody.data:
State ex rel. UTILITIES COMN.
v.
CP&L. No. 649A03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 25, 2004. Gisele L. Rankin, Staff Attorney, for Public Staff. James P. West, Raleigh, for Carolina Utility Customers Assc. Ralph McDonald, Raleigh, for Carolina Industrial Groups. Michael S. Colo, Rocky Mount, Thomas R. West, Raleigh, for Power Agency 1, Eastern Mun. Edward S. Finley, Jr., Len S. Anthony, Raleigh, Kodwo Ghartey-Tagoe, Robert B. Schwenker, Thomas K. Austin, Raleigh, for CP&L and Progress Energy, Duke Power Company, and NC Electric Membership Corp.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of March 2004 by Appellants (Attorney General of N.C, Public Staff-NC Utilities Commission, Carolina Utility Customers Association, Inc. and Carolina Industrial Group for Fair Utility Rates II) To Amend Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 25th day of March 2004."
